rule01W.Message: @entityID values should be a URI starting with http://, https:// or urn:

rule02W.Message:
This NameIDFormat may not be supported. Supported values for NameIDFormat are:
    urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:persistent
    urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient

rule03W.Message: Each IDPSSODescriptor should contain NameIDFormat with one or more values

rule04W.Message: Each SPSSODescriptor should contain NameIDFormat with one or more values

rule06W.Message: EntityDescriptor should contain ContactPerson with a contactType of "support" and at least one EmailAddress

rule07W.Message: EntityDescriptor should contain ContactPerson with a contactType of "technical" and at least one EmailAddress

rule08W.Message: EntityDescriptor created by the entity operator should not contain elements from the mdrpi namespace (urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:metadata:rpi); this is reserved for metadata publishers.

rule09E.Message: IDPSSODescriptor must contain a SingleSignOnService with Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect"

rule10W.Message: IDPSSODescriptor contains saml2:Attribute elements; but some implementations may not understand this.

rule11W.Message: SPSSODescriptor should contain an AssertionConsumerService with Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST"

rule16W.Message: AttributeConsumingService is deprecated if EntityCategory has an fixed set of RequestedAttributes.

rule18E.Message: EntityAttributes containing an EntityCategory need to be direct descendants of EntityDescriptor

rule19W.Message:
EntityCategories should be restricted to these values:
  http://www.ref.gv.at/ns/names/agiz/pvp/egovtoken,
  http://www.ref.gv.at/ns/names/agiz/pvp/egovtoken-charge

rule21W.Message: SPSSODescriptor should include a mdui:UIInfo element

rule22E.Message: UIInfo must include a non-empty DisplayName

rule23E.Message:
alg:DigestMethod element may only contain following @Algorithm values:
    http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha512
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#ripemd160

rule24E.Message:
Each alg:SigningMethod may only contain following @Algorithm values: 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha256 
    http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha384 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha512 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-ripemd160
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa-sha256 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa-sha384 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa-sha512

rule25W.Message: DigestMethod element should not contain @Algorithm value http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1

rule26W.Message: SigningMethod element should not contain @Algorithm value http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1

rule27E.Message: MinKeySize must be greater or equal to 2048 if Algorithm starts with http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa

rule28E.Message: MinKeySize must be greater or equal to 256 if Algorithm starts with http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa

rule29W.Message: alg:SigningMethod must have an attribute MaxKeySize

rule32E.Message: IDPSSODescriptor  must contain a mdui:UIInfo element

rule35W.Message: protocolSupportEnumeration should contain only "urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:protocol" (-> remove support for legacy protocols)

rule36E.Message: IDPSSODescriptor must contain a SingleSignOnService with Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST"

rule37E.Message: Each IDPSSODescriptor/SPSSODescriptor must contain at least one KeyDescriptor with a use="signing" attribute

rule38E.Message:
Each alg:SigningMethod may only contain following @Algorithm values:
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha256
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha512
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa-sha256
http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#ecdsa-sha512

rule39E.Message:
alg:DigestMethod element may only contain following @Algorithm values:
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha512 
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#ripemd160

rule40E.Message:
md:EncryptionMethod element may only contain following  values:
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#aes128-cbc
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#aes256-cbc
    http://www.w3.org/2009/xmlenc11#aes128-gcm
    http://www.w3.org/2009/xmlenc11#aes256-gcm
    http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p
    http://www.w3.org/2009/xmlenc11#ECDH-ES

rule41W.Message:
EntityCategories understood in this federation are:
    http://wirtschaftsportalverbund.at/ns/ec/attributebundle-wkis

rule42W.Message:
This NameIDFormat may not be supported. Recommended values for NameIDFormat are:
    urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:persistent 
    urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient

rule60E.Message: Each IDPSSODescriptor/SPSSODescriptor must contain a signing key as X509Certificate (child element of X509Data)

rule61E.Message: Each SPSSODescriptor must contain a signing key as X509Certificate (child element of X509Data)
